name: Happy December Limited Edition Lyric Cards
description:
Souvenirs! Souvenirs! Souvenirs!

We are hard at work making our third album in cold and beautiful Wales. To celebrate we have bought 100 exceptionally tacky assorted christmas cards. We will be enhancing them by writing a different lyric from the new album in each one.

The first order will receive the card with the most glitter. 

Fair is fair. 

Merry Winter season!

Peggy Sue

x

name: Television/New Song 7" *15 copies only* SOLD OUT
description:
Just stumbled upon a half full box of our first ever 7" single!

We self-released it on our very own (very short lived) Thesaurus Records as Peggy Sue and the Pirates way back in the day. 

I'm going to keep 3 for the grand-kids so there are 15 on sale.

£6 a pop.

ALL GONE SORRY!

x

name: "Fossils and Other Phantoms " Debut Album CD
description:
Our debut album, released on Wichita Records this past spring featuring 12 shiny new songs and artwork done by the ever tremendous Ben Phillips.

Clash: “The dual female vocals transport and transcend into beautiful plateaus of heartbreak and hoedowns with a a gritty edge unrivalled by their peers”

The Guardian: ****

Loud And Quiet: “‘Fossils And Other Phantoms’ is superb. It captures all the raw power of their live shows with enough production sheen to make this a great debut record. .. It’s been worth the wait”

N.M.E: “It’s in terms of sheer vocal prowess that Peggy Sue really come into their own, the duo’s spine-tingling harmonies elevating them from pretty damn impressive to all-out, head-over-heels brilliant”

Q Magazine: “On their amiably unvarnished debut, ‘Fossils And Other Phantoms’ Peggy Sue are a bit punky, a bit folky, even a bit rockabilly, but always refreshingly themselves”

1.  LONG DIVISION BLUES
2.  YO MAMA
3.  I READ IT IN THE PAPER
4.  GREEN GROW THE RUSHES
5.  WATCHMAN
6.  SHE CALLED
7.  CARELESS TALK COSTS LIVES
8.  THE REMAINDER
9.  MATILDA
10. FEBRUARY SNOW
11. FOSSILS
12. THE SHAPE WE MADE

x


*PLEASE ALLOW UP TO 14 DAYS FOR DELIVERY BECAUSE WE ARE QUITE DISORGANISED BUT ALSO OFTEN ON THE ROAD*
